passages.title: SECTION E - Cloze Test
passages.content: Akuba was trained as an accountant. After graduation, she went out to ---31--- employment. She visited several firms but was ---32--- in securing a job. Afiba, her friend, finally advised her to read the newspapers for ---33--- of vacant positions. Fortunately, a reputable company was looking for a ---34--- accountant who was ---35--- in financial reporting. Akuba immediately submitted her application, attended an interview and within a week, she received an appointment letter. Her patience and perseverance had finally paid off.
passages.subject: english
